title: Did a WTC Leaseholder Buy Terrorism Insurance Just Before 9/11?
subtitle: A longstanding urban legend holds that World Trade Center leaseholder Larry Silverstein "fortuitously" took out terrorism insurance just months before the 9/11 attacks.
author: David Emery
vclaim: World Trade Center leaseholder Larry Silverstein bought terrorism insurance two months before 9/11, then collected double its value on the grounds that there were two attacks.
